platform.evmanagement
Class Subscription

java.lang.Object
  platform.evmanagement.Subscription

public class Subscription
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a subscription which will be managed by the Event Manager Subsystem

Author:

Constructor Detail

Subscription

public Subscription()
Empty subscription

Subscription

public Subscription(java.lang.String ConsumerURI,
                    java.lang.String ConsumerId,
                    java.lang.String ProducerURI,
                    java.lang.String ProducerId,
                    java.util.ArrayList<org.json.JSONObject> payload,
                    long end)
Constructor for a threshold event subscription.

Parameters:
ConsumerURI - - Root URI of the event consumer.
Consumer - Id - Consumer Id belonging to the root URI.
ProducerURI - - Root URI of the event producer.
Payload - - Information of interest characterizing a threshold event. This parameter is an ArrayList of JSON Objects (See JSONObject).
end - - Indicates the end time for the subscription. (reference Unix Epoch).

Subscription

public Subscription(java.lang.String ConsumerURI,
                    java.lang.String ConsumerId,
                    java.lang.String ProducerURI,
                    java.lang.String ProducerId,
                    java.util.ArrayList<org.json.JSONObject> payload,
                    long end,
                    java.lang.String driver)
Constructor for a threshold event subscription.

Parameters:
ConsumerURI - - Root URI of the event consumer.
Consumer - Id - Consumer Id belonging to the root URI.
ProducerURI - - Root URI of the event producer.
Payload - - Information of interest characterizing a threshold event. This parameter is an ArrayList of JSON Objects (See JSONObject).
end - - Indicates the end time for the subscription. (reference Unix Epoch).
driver - - Id of the driver to forward the subscription

Subscription

public Subscription(java.lang.String ConsumerURI,
                    java.lang.String ConsumerId,
                    java.lang.String ProducerURI,
                    java.lang.String ProducerId,
                    java.util.ArrayList<org.json.JSONObject> payload,
                    long start,
                    long end,
                    long period)
Constructor for a contract event subscription.

Parameters:
ConsumerURI - - Root URI of the event consumer.
Consumer - Id - Consumer Id belonging to the root URI.
ProducerURI - - Root URI of the event producer.
Payload - - Information of interest characterizing the event by contract. This parameter is an ArrayList of JSON Objects (See JSONObject).
start - - Indicates the starting time (in milliseconds) for the subscription. (reference Unix Epoch).
end - - Indicates the end time (in milliseconds) for the subscription (reference Unix Epoch).
period - - Period until forwarding to the consumer any event in the buffer.

Subscription

public Subscription(org.json.JSONObject jsonSubscription)
This constructor can be used for either contract events or threshold events.

Parameters:
jsonSubscription - - A JSON Object containing a subscription as it is defined in Platform specification.
